a_note_to_you_catblock_lovers.description: Message header for a note directed to users who want to know how to get CatBlock.

adalreadyblocked.message: Nemusíte robiť nič, pretože reklama je už blokovaná
adalreadyblocked.description: on the ad report page, telling a user there is nothing to do

adblock_auto_removes_ads_thats_all.message: AdBlock automaticky odstraňuje reklamy. To je všetko, k čomu slúži.
adblock_auto_removes_ads_thats_all.description: Install page: explaining how to use adblock.

adblock_is_paused.message: AdBlock je pozastavený. Pretože neboli zachytené žiadne prvky, nie je možné túto stránku použiť. Najprv spustite AdBlock a potom to znovu skúste.

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.message: AdBlock sa nebude spúšťať na zodpovedajúcich stránkach:
adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the whitelister dialog will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.

adreport2.message:
Našli ste reklamu na web stránke? Dobre, pomôžem vám nájsť správne miesto, kde ju nahlásiť!
Zapamätajte si: Nahlásenie reklamy je dobrovoľné. Pokiaľ si ju neprajete nahlásiť, môžete zavrieť toto okno a zablokovať ju len pre seba tým, že pridáte jej filter na záložke 'Prispôsobenie' na stránke s nastavením !
adreport2.description: Instructions on ad reporting page. 'Customize' should be the same text as the 'tabcustomize' message.

adsoneverysite.message: Vidíte reklamy na veľmi veľa stránkach ktoré navštevujete (vaša domovská stránka...) ale keď ich navštívite na priateľovom počítačí reklamy sa nezobrazujú?
adsoneverysite.description: On the ad report page, text of the item asking if they see ads on most sites (which may be due to malware)

advanced_options.message: Som skúsený používateľ, ukáž mi pokročilé možnosti.

any_new_tabs_you_open_Will_be_automatica.message: Akékoľvek novo-otvorené web stránky budú automaticky bez reklám

appliedwhenbrowsing.message: Tento filter sa použije pri prehliadaní:

blacklistclickmessage.message: Kliknite pravým tlačidlom myši na reklamu pre jej zablokovanie -- alebo ju zablokujte ručne tu.
blacklistclickmessage.description: Message at the top of the blacklist options tab

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the slider page

blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Buďte opatrný: tento filter blokuje všetky $elementtype$ elementy na stránke!
blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked

blacklistereditfilter.message: Prosím zadajte správny filter a stlačte OK
blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter.  'OK' is the standard javascript popup button text.

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Messagebox if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blacklistermatches.message: Toto zodpovedá $matchcount$ položkám na tejto stránke .
blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklisternotsure.message: Nie ste si istý? tak len stlačte tlačidlo 'Blokovať!' nižšie.
blacklisternotsure.description: Blacklister attribute choosing page message.  'Block it!' must be the same as the text of the 'buttonblockit' message.

blacklisteroptions1.message: Myslíte si, že budete platiť za túto reklamu zakaždým, keď navštívite túto stránku?

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Posledný krok: Podľa čoho rozpoznám reklamu?

blacklistersinglematch.message: Toto zodpovedá 1 položke na tejto stránke.
blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found

blacklisterthefilter.message: Filter, ktorý sa dá neskôr zmeniť v Nastaveniach na záložke Vlastný filter:

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that no filter was specified

block_an_ad_on_this_page.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

block_by_url_instead.message: Pre skúsených: Blokovať podľa URL namiesto tohto

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the blacklister

blockdomain.description: Message of the url and css -blocking area

buttonback.description: Back to previous wizard page button

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelister dialog

cantblockflash.message: Zatiaľ nemôžeme blokovať reklamy vo vnútri objektov Flash alebo v iných doplnkoch. Čakáme na podporu od prehliadača a WebKitu.
cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question

cantblockflashwarning.message: Objavuje sa reklama vo filme alebo pred ním, alebo v akomkoľvek inom doplnku, napr. vo Flashovej hre?
cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question

casesensitive.message: Tento filter rozlišuje malé a veľké písmená:

catblock_was_only_in_adblock_for_a_few_d.message: CatBlock je v AdBlocku len do 4.apríla . Ak chcete mať CatBlock po tomto dátume, prečítajte si toto.
catblock_was_only_in_adblock_for_a_few_d.description: Message shown to users expressing intent to get CatBlock after April 4th.  It links them to instructions for getting the standalone version of CatBlock.

changelabel.description: link to change resources on the resourceblock page

checkinfirefox_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

chrome.example: This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.

checkinfirefox_2.message: Nainštalujte Adblock Plus pre FireFox $chrome$ ak ho nemáte.
checkinfirefox_2.description: instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'AdBlock Plus'.

chrome.example: This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.

checkinfirefox_3.message: Načítajte v tomto prehliadači tie isté filtre ktoré máte tu (okrem AdBlock filtrov vo FireFoxe).
checkinfirefox_3.description: instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_4.message: Načítajte v prehliadači stránku s reklamou.
checkinfirefox_4.description: instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_5.message: Tiež sa zobrazuje reklama v tomto prehliadači?
checkinfirefox_5.description: instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefoxtitle.description: tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox/Chrome

chrome.example: This will only be shown in Safari. Chrome users will not see this.

chromebutton_how_to_hide.message: Ak chcete skryť tlačidlo, kliknite naň pravým tlačidlom myši a vyberte príkaz Skryť tlačidlo. Môžete ho opäť zobraziť kliknutím na 'Kľúč' | Nástroje | Rozšírenia
chromebutton_how_to_hide.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button.  'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.

cleanuplist.description: Option at the bottom of the third options tab

click_extensions.message: Kliknite na Extensions v blízkosti pravého horného rohu.
click_extensions.description: Second step to turn on autoupdate, after opening Safari -> Preferences.

click_install_update_automatically.description: Last step to turn on autoupdate, after opening Safari -> Preferences -> Extensions -> Updates.

click_safari_prefs.description: First step to turn on autoupdate.  ⇒ makes a right arrow (->).

click_updates.message: V ľavom dolnom rohu kliknite na Updates.
click_updates.description: Third step to turn on autoupdate, after opening Safari -> Preferences -> Extensions.

clickthead.message: Kliknite na reklamu, a ja vám ju pomôžem zablokovať.
clickthead.description: When you have to click the ad to continue

close_tab_begin_browsing.message: Teraz môžete zavrieť túto kartu a začať surfovať bez reklám!

correctfilters.description: on the ad report page, label describing having the right set of filters

custompattern.description: Label in front of the 'custom block pattern' textbox in resourceblock, after clicking a resource

debuginlogoption.message: Zobrazovať chybové hlásenia v protokole konzoly (toto spomaluje AdBlock)

description1.message: Najobľúbenejšie rozšírenie pre Chrome s viac ako 8 miliónmi užívateľov! Blokuje reklamy na celom webe.

did_you_know_this_is_my_full_time_job.message: Vedeli ste, že toto je moje zamestnanie?
did_you_know_this_is_my_full_time_job.description: Text of a payment request link

disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Prepáčte, ale AdBlock je na tejto stránke zakázaný jedným z vašich filtrov.
disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list.

disabled_on_this_page.message: AdBlock je na tejto stránke zakázaný
disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted.

doesntmatchoriginal.message: Vzor, ktorý ste zadali nezodpovedá prostriedku ktorý má byť blokovaný! Chcete napriek tomu pokračovať?

done.description: Install page: appended to the 'installing_adblock' message once the progress bar reaches 100%

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard.

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to whitelist a page

enable.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'disabled_on_this_page'.

excludedomainorurl.message: Doména alebo URL, na ktorej AdBlock nesmie nič blokovať

excludefilterremoved.message: Filter bol odstránený. Prosím, obnovte pôvodnú stránku pre vytvorenie zoznamu prvkov.
excludefilterremoved.description: Warning when a page exclusion rule was removed in resourceblock.html

faq.description: Text of link to a page with answers to frequently asked questions.  The capitalization should be the same as for the 'help' and 'project_home' messages

filecleanerwarning.message: Pokiaľ vidíte túto správu pri každom spustení Adblock-u, uistite sa, či nepoužívate súborový čistič, ktorý čistí 'LocalStorage' súbory .
filecleanerwarning.description: Help for users who use hyperactive file cleaners

filterchinese.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filterczech.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filterdanish.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filterdutch.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plun_korean.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_bulgarian.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_finnish.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_french.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_german.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_greek.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_polish.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_romanian.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasylist_plus_spanish.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtereasyprivacy.description: A filter list. Don't translate the name 'EasyPrivacy'.

filterhasbeenadded.message:
Filter bol úspešne pridaný!
Načítajte stránku znovu pre zobrazenie výsledku!
filterhasbeenadded.description: resourceblocking page string (the 'slash n' is a line break)

filterhungarian.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filterisraeli.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filteritalian.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filterjapanese.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filterlistlink.message: Neprihlasujte k odberu viac filtrov ako potrebujete -- každý filter naviac spôsobí drobné spomalenie! Poďakovanie a ďalšie zoznamy nájdete tu.

filterlistsrock.message: Zoznamy filtrov blokujú väčšinu reklám na webe. Môžete tiež:
filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab.  'Filter lists' should be the same text as the tabfilterlists message.

filterpolish.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filterrussian.description: A filter list. If it's the filter list for your language, please add '(recommended)'

filtersavewarning.message:
Buďte opatrný: pokiaľ tu urobíte chybu, veľa iných filtrov, vrátane oficiálnych , môžu byť tiež poškodené!
Prečítajte si filter syntax tutorial (anglicky) kde sa dozviete, ako pridávať pokročilé vlastné filtre a výnimky.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the filter list tab

findingads.description: When you press ctrl-shift-K the blacklister searches for ads

first_turn_on_autoupdate_to_get_bugfixes.message: Najprv by ste mali zapnúť automatické aktualizácie v Safari Preferences. Tak dostanete opravy a nové funkcie, ihneď ako budú vydané.
first_turn_on_autoupdate_to_get_bugfixes.description: The first instructions on the Safari install page.

fixityourself.message: OK, môžete si zablokovať túto reklamu len pre seba v Nastaveniach na záložke Vlastný filter. Ďakujem!
fixityourself.description: telling a user who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for herself

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in FF

for_more_options_right_click.message: Pre viac možností, kliknite pravým tlačidlom myši na webovú stránku alebo kliknite na $img$ tlačidlo na panely nástrojov.
for_more_options_right_click.description: Install page: explaining how to use adblock in more detail.

img.example: A small picture of the toolbar button.  Do not translate.

format_site1_site2_site3.description: Example showing users how to input a list of sites on the Customize tab. You can translate the 'news' and 'siteN' but leave the '|'s and '~'s in place.

googletextads.message: Páčia sa mi textové Google reklamy vo výsledkoch vyhľadávania; zobrazuj ich.

help.description: Text of link to a page with fixes to common problems and a list of known issues

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

i_came_here_looking_for_catblock.message: Toto ma napadlo - CatBlock! Namiesto reklamy budete vidieť obrázok s mačkou!
i_came_here_looking_for_catblock.description: Install page checkbox letting the user indicate that they installed AdBlock because they heard about CatBlock, and they want to enable it.

i_like_googles_text_ads_dont_block_those.message: Páčia sa mi textové Google reklamy; neblokuj ich.
i_like_googles_text_ads_dont_block_those.description: Install page text; slightly shorter than the 'googletextads' message.

installedtitle.description: Title for the installation success page

installing_adblock.description: Install page: shown while progress bar loads

invalidListUrl.message: Neplatný zoznam URL. Zoznam bude vymazaný.
invalidListUrl.description: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL

labelshow.description: The label when you click the 'show links to filter lists' option

last_update_failed.description: Status of a filter list on the options page, it is followed by the message 'updated[seconds|minute(s)|hour(s)|day(s)]ago'

lets_get_you_set_up.description: Install page: section header for Safari users.  These users do not see the section with the 'set_up_adblock' message.  The tone should be friendly.

linkunblock.message: Zobrazovať reklamy na webovej stránke alebo doméne

maybemalware.message: Nie všetky stránky na internete obsahujú reklamu. Niektoré reklamy nie sú na stránke ale počítač ich zobrazuje. V tomto prípade môžete byť váš počítač infikovaný malvérom. Skúste vypnúť všetky rozšírenia v prehliadači a ak problém zotrváva, spustite plnú kontrolu systému s aktualizovaným antivírusom.
maybemalware.description: Ad report page string, telling them they *may* have malware. Please make sure you don't translate it as if you say 'you DO have malware' but as 'you MAY have malware'

modifydomain.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the domain part of a URL

modifypath.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the path part of a URL

multipledomainshint.message: Oddeľte viac domén čiarkami alebo medzerami

new_version.description: Tooltip on toolbar button when a significant new version is released

newtitle.description: Message in popup button telling users about new features

no.description: A negative response to a question

nodefaultfilter1.message:
Nemáme zoznam filtrov pre daný jazyk.
Prosím, skúste nájsť vhodný zoznam pre tento jazyk $link$ alebo si túto reklamu zablokujte len pre seba na záložke 'Prispôsobenie'.
nodefaultfilter1.description: instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list. 'Customize' should be the same message as 'tabcustomize'.

noresourcessend2.message: Niekde nastala chyba. Neboli preposlané žiadne prvky. Táto stránka sa teraz zavrie. Skúste načítať stránku ešte raz.

nosearchresults.description: Text in resourceblock shown if no results are found after searching

novalidurlpattern.message: Prosím, zadajte platnú vzorovú adresu URL!

now_you_have_adblock_hooray.description: Install page title.  'Hooray' is a silly word shouted when you are excited, for example if your team just won a game.

ok_autoupdate_is_on.description: Install page: text of button to press after turning on autoupdate.

ok_now_what.description: Install page: text of button to press after learning how to use AdBlock. 'Now what?' is a slang expression meaning 'I have done everything you have asked so far; what do I do next?'

oneverysitetitle.description: On the ad report page, title of the item asking if it could be caused by malware.

only_block_ads_on_these_sites.message: Blokovať reklamy len na týchto stránkach:
only_block_ads_on_these_sites.description: Label for textbox where user enters a list of sites on Customize tab

onlyresourcetypes.message: Tento filter sa vzťahuje na prvky týchto typov:

opera_120_install.message: Opera verzie nižšej ako 12.50 neblokuje všetky reklamy, pretože to nie je možné. Toto bude opravené, keď sa Opera aktualizuje na verziu 12.50. Od toho momentu budú blokované všetky reklamy

opera_120_options.message: V Opere verzie nižšej ako 12.50 sú niektoré možnosti obmedzené, pretože v týchto verziách nie sú niektoré funkcie podporované.

opera_can_also_change_setting.description: Message when the storage quota is reached, for advanced users in Opera

opera_donations_button.message: Máte radi toto rozšírenie? Ak áno, pomôžte nám donáciou na stránke nastavení!
opera_donations_button.description: Opera donate request in the button

opera_donations_install.message: Ak milujete toto rozšírenie, prosím prispejte donáciou cez stránku nastavení.
opera_donations_install.description: Opera donate request in the install page

opera_enabledin.description: Hover text of items disabled in an older browser version

opera_excludedomainorurl.message: Doména, kde AdBlock by nemal nič blokovať

opera_for_more_options.message: Pre viac možností, môžete kliknúť na tlačidlo alebo otvoriť nastavenia cez Opera ⇒ Rozšírenie ⇒ Spravovať rozšírenia ⇒ ikona kľúča ⇒ Predvoľby
opera_for_more_options.description: Install page string telling where to find the preferences in Opera. ⇒ makes a right arrow (->)

opera_reenable_button.message: Tlačidlo môžete znovu zobraziť v nastavení rozšírenia
opera_reenable_button.description: Opera browser button message when you click 'hide this button'

opera_show_toolbar_button.description: Opera option to show/hide the button

options.description: The text of the link on chrome://extensions that gets you to the Options page for an extension

pagelanguagecheck.message: V akom jazyku je stránka napísaná?

please_fill_out_adblocks_one_question_se.description: Install page instructions.  The one question is a checkbox.

project_home.description: Text of link to the AdBlock open source project homepage (not the install page)

refusetocheck.description: user is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter

reportfilterlistproblem.message: Toto je chyba zoznamu filtrov. Nahláste ju tu: $link$
reportfilterlistproblem.description: telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer

link.example: EXAMPLE 1: John Doe EXAMPLE 2: EasyList forums

reportpubliclyavailable.message: Poznámka: vaše nahlásenie môže byť verejne dostupné. Majte to na pamäti predtým ako tam vložíte niečo súkromné.
reportpubliclyavailable.description: Ad report page string, when you're about to submit a report

reporttous2.message: Ak viete anglicky, môžete nám reklamu nahlásiť do zoznamu problémov.
reporttous2.description: NOTE: non-English translations should replace the first sentence and instead say 'If you can speak English, you can report the ad to us in the issue tracker.'

resourcedomain.description: Text shown when hovering over an item in the third-party column

resourceiswhitelisted.message: Vybraný prvok je na zozname povolených. Preto ho nemôžete blokovať.

retryaftersubscribe.message: Prihláste sa k odberu tohoto zoznamu filtrov a skúste to znovu: $list_title$
retryaftersubscribe.description: instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists

safari50_updatenotice.message: Používate starú verziu prehiadača Safari. Získajte najnovšiu verziu prehliadača Safari, ktorá umožňuje pozastaviť AdBlock stlačením tlačidla na paneli nástrojov, nahlásiť reklamy a poskytuje ďalšie nové funkcie. Aktualizovať prehliadač.
safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade

searchexplanation.message: Použite znak * pre zápis viac znakov. Napríklad, 'banner*.gif' zodpovedá výsledku 'banner.gif', 'banner123.gif', a 'bannerxyz.gif'.
searchexplanation.description: Text in resourceblock when you hover your mouse over the search textbox

searchplaceholder.description: Text in resourceblock shown in the search textbox before you type something

seeing_this_every_time_you_start_your_br.message: Vidíte túto stránku pri každom spustení prehliadača?
seeing_this_every_time_you_start_your_br.description: Install page: link to click for help

selectresources.message: Vyberte prvok, ktorý chcete blokovať alebo povoliť

show_ads_except_for.description: Section title for blacklisting section of Customize tab

show_me_how.description: Install page: text of button Safari users can press to be shown how to turn on autoupdate

showcontextmenus.message: Pridať položky do ponuky po kliknutí pravým tlačidlom myši.

sliderexplanation.message: Nastavte posuvník tak, aby reklama na stránke bola blokovaná a zbytok stránky stále vyzeral uspokojivo.

slidertitle.message: Krok 1: Určte, čo sa bude blokovať

status_disabled.message: AdBlock sa nedá spustiť na tejto doméne
status_disabled.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that disallow extensions, such as the Extensions Gallery or about:blank.

status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is paused.

storage_quota_exceeded.message: AdBlock používa príliš veľa pamäte. Prosím, odznačte niekoľko filtrov zo zoznamu!
storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser

subscribe.example: Subscribe. Only translate between the > and then <

unsubscribe.example: unsubscribe. Only translate between the > and then <

tabcustomize.description: A tab on the options page

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the options page

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the options page

that_was_easy.description: Install page: button text at end of setup section to proceed to the next section.  The text is reflecting what the user is thinking ('That setup was easier than I expected!')

thirdparty.description: Resource list column title telling if the resource originates from a different domain

thirdpartycheckbox.message: Akékoľvek webové stránky, s výnimkou stránok na doméne $domain$

this_toolbar_button.message: Toto tlačidlo je na paneli nástrojov :)
this_toolbar_button.description: The description of what is new in version 2.3.0: a toolbar button was added to the extension

to_turn_on_autoupdate.description: Install page: title of section with a list of steps to take

translator_credit.description: Credit for your translation with $translator_names$ being your own name below. Multiple names should be separated by a comma.

turning_on_autoupdate_is_really_importan.description: Message on Safari install page convincing users to not skip this setup step

unpause.description: Link text to unpause AdBlock, displayed immediately after 'status_paused'.

updatefromoldversion.message: Používate zastaralú verziu programu AdBlock. Prosím, najprv musíte aktualizovať $updatelink$ AdBlock na najnovšiu verziu

updatenowmessage.message: Aktualizácie filtrov sa sťahujú automaticky; ale môžete ich aj stiahnuť teraz.

updateyourlists.message: Uistite sa, že zoznamy filtrov sú aktuálne

warning_overrules_filters.message:
Upozornenie: na všetkých ostatných stránkach uvidíte reklamy!
Toto má prednosť pred všetkými ostatnými filtrami pre tieto stránky.
warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the third tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a blacklisting filter

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelister dialog

wildcardhint.message: Pozn.: tu môžete použiť * ako zástupný znak

yes.description: A positive response to a question

you_can_slide_to_change.message: Nastavením posuvníku nižšie vyberte tie stránky,pri ktorých sa AdBlock nebude spúšťať.
you_can_slide_to_change.description: Instructions for how to use the whitelister slider controls.  Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Čím viac filtrov prihlásite, tým bude AdBlock pomalší. Použitie príliš veľa zoznamov môže dokonca spôsobiť pád prehliadača na niektorých stránkach. Pre potvrdenie prihlásenia stlačte tlačidlo OK
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.
